title: Disaster Recovery and Backup
content:
Module 8, Lesson 10: Disaster Recovery and Backup

Introduction

This lesson covers Disaster Recovery and Backup, a core topic in DevOps & Deployment. Mastering this area will help you build reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

Key Concepts

1. Fundamentals

Understanding the foundational principles of Disaster Recovery and Backup ensures you can apply them correctly in a variety of real-world scenarios. Always prefer clarity over cleverness.

2. Practical Application

Theory must translate into working code. In DevOps & Deployment, every concept has direct practical implications for how you architect, test, and deploy applications.

3. Common Pitfalls

Awareness of common mistakes in Disaster Recovery and Backup helps you avoid costly bugs and security vulnerabilities. Review real-world examples and practise defensive coding techniques.

4. Best Practices

Industry best practices evolve constantly. Keep up with community standards, read production post-mortems, and participate in code reviews to sharpen your skills in DevOps & Deployment.

Summary

You have completed Disaster Recovery and Backup in Module 8. Continue to the next lesson to build further expertise in DevOps & Deployment.
